channel.title: Make the ancients light up, with out needing runes
channel.description:
NO! this isnt a request for making ancients work without runes. its a request or a tip on making the icons show like there was runes.
anyone got somthin like this?

item.title: Make the ancients light up, with out needing runes
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

Go to a client, go to spirites, find SPELLOFF_32 or something like that, then find the already coloured spirites for that image, copy it and paste, then re-name the name of the copied image to the one that says its off.

Read full topic
item.source: Make the ancients light up, with out needing runes
